SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.deck

Class Deck<CardType extends Card>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.deck.Deck<CardType>
Type Parameters:
CardType - type of the cards inside the deck
public class Deck<CardType extends Card> extends Observable
A deck is a collection of cards, implemented as a stack of generic cards. All cards in a Deck must be of the same type.

    • Deck

      public Deck(List<CardType> cards, List<Observer> observers, AtomicInteger lastEventId)
      Parameters:
      cards - list of cards that will be added to the deck
      observers - list of observers
      lastEventId - integer used to uniquely identify events

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public Optional<CardType> draw(PlayerToken playerToken, int handIndex)
      Allows to draw a card from the top of the deck.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - token of the player drawing the card
      handIndex - index of the hand where card will be placed
      Returns:
      Optional.of(drawn card) if the deck was not empty, Optional.empty() otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Override of Object::toString method for Deck class.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string that represents the deck

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Reimplementation of Stack::empty method.
      Returns:
      true if deck is empty, false otherwise

    • size

      public int size()
      Reimplementation of Stack::size method.
      Returns:
      the size of the deck

    • anonymousDraw

      public Trio<Optional<CardType>,Boolean,Integer> anonymousDraw()
      Only used during setup phase of the game and when it's guaranteed decks are not empty. Invocation of this method will not notify observers.
      Returns:
      a trio containing: the drawn card, a boolean telling if the draw emptied the main deck, and the next card's id

    • getNextCardId

      public Integer getNextCardId()
      Allows to retrieve the id of the card at the top of the deck.
      Returns:
      null if deck is empty, the id of the top card otherwise

    • asListOfIds

      public List<Integer> asListOfIds()
      Cretes a list containing the card ids. The first id is the one of the card that's at the bottom of the deck and the last id in the list belongs to the card at the top of the deck.
      Returns:
      the deck as a list of ids
